meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a dwarf in size or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The dwarfish house was tiny and cozy.
meanings.sent2: The garden gnome had a dwarfish stature.
meanings.sent3: The dwarfish puppy tried to jump on the tall couch.
meanings.sent4: The dwarfish tree stood out among the giants in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The dwarfish hat looked comical on his head.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to dwarfs or dwarfism.
meanings.sent1: The fairy tale had a dwarfish character who was brave.
meanings.sent2: The dwarfish community celebrated their unique culture.
meanings.sent3: The dwarfish shoes were specially made for small feet.
meanings.sent4: His dwarfish heritage made him proud of his roots.
meanings.sent5: The dwarfish language was filled with magical words.
